name: io.github.motherduckdb/mcp-server-motherduck
description: Fast analytics and data processing with DuckDB and MotherDuck

package_arguments.name: --port
package_arguments.description: Port to listen on for sse and stream transport mode

package_arguments.name: --db-path
package_arguments.description: Path to local DuckDB database file or MotherDuck database

package_arguments.name: --motherduck-token
package_arguments.description: Access token to use for MotherDuck database connections

package_arguments.name: --read-only
package_arguments.description: Flag for connecting to DuckDB or MotherDuck in read-only mode

package_arguments.name: --saas-mode
package_arguments.description: Flag for connecting to MotherDuck in SaaS mode (disables filesystem and write permissions for local DuckDB)

package_arguments.name: --json-response
package_arguments.description: Enable JSON responses for HTTP stream (only supported for stream transport)

environment_variables.name: motherduck_token
environment_variables.description: Access token to use for MotherDuck database connections

environment_variables.name: HOME
environment_variables.description: Home directory for DuckDB (used as default if --home-dir not specified)
